attributes.action: Add more bike lanes around London.
attributes.background: Use more money on bike lanes rather then moterway to reduce congestion, help stop global warming, boost the economy and reduce death on the road.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road improvements in London are a matter for Transport for London, the Mayor of London and the London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
